entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
